Nerangs.ab: aēsmą ... xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe tā āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe az aēsmąn āiiese yešti tā ānōh dō bār guftan agar xšnūman dudīgar bēd az ān xšnūman dō bār guftan

"(They should recite:) aēsmą ... xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe until āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe. They should recite twice from aēsmąn āiiese yešti until this passage. If it is another šnūman, they should recite this šnūman twice."

aēsmą ... xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe dō bār guftan ā y ašȧōnąm frauuaṣ̌inąm tā ō ī nabanazdištanąm. agar yazišn ahlawān bēd dō bār az aēsmąn ā y guftan tā xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm ... aṣ̌āunąm. frauuašịnąm. tā nabanzadištanąm frauuašịnąm guftan pas auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō ...

"They should recite twice aēsmą ... xšnūmaine sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanu.mąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe (and then continue with) ā y ašȧōnąm frauuaṣ̌inąm until nabanazdištanąm. If it is a liturgy for the ahlawān, they should recite twice from aēsmąn ā y until xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm ... aṣ̌āunąm. frauuašịnąm. and until nabanzadištanąm frauuašịnąm. Then (they recite:) auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō. ..."
